verbs.description: In the hope of [V: preserving] [ARG1: the Russia probe] , [ARG0: the deputy attorney general] surrendered ground to President Donald Trump , who is severely testing the limits of interference .

In the hope of preserving the Russia probe , the deputy attorney general surrendered ground to President Donald Trump , who [V: is] severely testing the limits of interference .

In the hope of preserving the Russia probe , the deputy attorney general surrendered ground to [ARG0: President Donald Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] is [ARGM-MNR: severely] [V: testing] [ARG1: the limits of interference] .
